product_name: Estee LauderAdvanced Night Repair Moisturizing Overnight Treatment
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingLock in your nighttime skincare regimen with Estée Lauder's breathable Advanced Night Repair Overnight Treatment formulated to visibly recharge skin with intense moisture and barrier recovery.
details: DetailsBenefitsHigh-performance, leave-on mask melts upon application, molding into skin to create a breathable, cocooning, second-skin sealVisibly activates age recovery every night: Plumps with quenching moisture, strengthens skin's barrier & reduces the look of linesWhile we sleep, skin naturally repairs - making night the optimal moment to recover from aging assaultsBuilding on 40 years of night science, this overnight mask is specifically formulated to visibly recharge skin & harness skin's own overnight age recovery power, so every morning you awaken to a fresher, more recovered lookLocks in your nighttime skincare regimen to help optimize visible age recoverySkin awakens with a radiant, recharged, energized lookKey IngredientsExclusive Night Peptide helps optimize skin's natural rhythm of renewalMulti-molecular weight Hyaluronic acid + Polyglutamic acid (PGA) for intense moisture recovery13% Lipid infusion for powerful barrier recoveryResearch ResultsHelps skin look like it got 2 nights of sleep in 1. (1)Moisture +58% (2)Barrier +40% (3)13% smoother (4)28% more radiant (4)13% less lined (4)95% said skin feels recharged upon waking. (5)91% said it blankets skin with moisture. (6)90% said it melts into skin on contact. (7)Appropriate for post-procedure use.(8) Also appropriate for fragile, sensitive skin.(1) 72% agreed in consumer testing on 127 women who identify as poor sleepers after 4 weeks product use nightly.(2) Clinical testing on 26 women, after 1 product application.(3) Clinical testing on 32 women, 2 hours after 1 product application.(4) Clinical testing on 33 women, 12 hours after a single nighttime product application.(5) Consumer testing on 163 women after using product for 4 weeks, nightly.(6) Consumer testing on 163 women after 1 product application at night, measured after 12 hours.(8) Used starting within 36 hours after Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) treatment in a 2 week clinical usage test on 33 panelists.Item 2625265How To UseApply Overnight Face Mask nightly, all over face and neck. Use as a last step to lock in your nighttime skincare regimen.Step 1: Rub fingers together to warm the face mask balm.Step 2. Gently press the overnight balm into skin.Step 3. Massage in any excess product on neck area.Inspired by the needs of post-procedure skin during its recovery period, this application technique was developed by an Estée Lauder esthetician. It enables the Overnight Skin Treatment to melt and mold into skin to create an exquisite second-skin cocoon feeling.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, C9-12 Alkane, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Peg-100 Stearate, Tripeptide-32, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Polyglutamate, Succinic Acid, Artemia Extract, Squalane, Lactobacillus Ferment, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caffeine, Algae Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Hordeum Vulgare Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Sorbitol, Potassium Palmitoyl Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Maltodextrin, Steareth-21, Dimethicone Crosspolymer-3, Steareth-2, Hexylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glucose, Bht, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 4 (CI 14700).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Overnight Face Mask nightly, all over face and neck. Use as a last step to lock in your nighttime skincare regimen.Step 1: Rub fingers together to warm the face mask balm.Step 2. Gently press the overnight balm into skin.Step 3. Massage in any excess product on neck area.Inspired by the needs of post-procedure skin during its recovery period, this application technique was developed by an Estée Lauder esthetician. It enables the Overnight Skin Treatment to melt and mold into skin to create an exquisite second-skin cocoon feeling.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I've seen a total transformation! Nice and moisturizing and feels super smooth

reviews.headline: Buttery Soft Skin
reviews.comments: This product is simply amazing! Ive tried tons of night creams but this one stands out. Leaves my skin buttery soft but not oily. I have oily skin so thats key. The cost is a little high but you get ALOT and it goes a long way. It is fragranced but not too strong.

media.headline: I love this and continue loving it
media.caption: My overnight treatment

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been using the Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Cream for three years now, and it has become a staple in my skincare routine. At 37 years old, I've been consistently impressed by its performance since the very first use.
The cream is incredibly hydrating and has noticeably reduced puffiness, fine lines, and dark circles under my eyes. I wake up looking refreshed and my skin feels plump. With continued use, I've noticed my under-eye area appears smoother and more radiant.
It has a rich yet lightweight texture that absorbs quickly into the skin without feeling greasy. A little goes a long way, so the small jar lasts surprisingly long. It doesn't interfere with my makeup or concealer; in fact, it helps to hold the concealer in place and reduces creasing.
The eye cream contains hyaluronic acid, which provides excellent hydration, along with antioxidants that help protect the delicate skin around the eyes. Over time, I've seen improvement in fine lines and overall firmness. It seems to enhance the resilience of the skin around my eyes, giving it a more youthful appearance. Despite having sensitive skin, I have never experienced any allergic reactions because of it.
The Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Cream is definitely a luxury product worth investing in if you're looking to combat signs of aging and fatigue around the eyes. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable eye cream that delivers on its promises.  This product was gifted by Estée Lauder, but I want to assure you that it does not compromise my honesty in providing this review.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best eye cream for wrinkles

faceoff_negative.comments: The idea of the product is good but how it is delivered is just awful! The emulsion was poured hot instead of cooling it down and ending up with a smooth cocoon feel of cashmere softness, just like the Genaissance de la Mer The Concentrated Night Balm, which is another ELC product and served as the chassis for the ANR Night Balm too. ANR Night Balm is too brittle, crystallisation of the butters is visible to the eyes due to not stirring it until it was cool. This also resulted in that the other oils in the formula are not properly emulsified and at application they just coat the skin with an inelegant oiliness. Although this absorbs eventually and the finish is smooth and satiny, it is not the splendid sensorial experience that one expects at this price point, nor from the ELC! Hopefully the R&D dept. will take notice of this. As far as I can see of all the reviews, mine is the only one of someone who actually purchased the product and was not given it by the ELC. Needless to say, I will return this and no repurchase for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Just Awful! - EL Can Do Far Better Than This!
